column1: 2/Set, Red Ticking Stripe Fabric Stocking Ornament
column4:
Our Red Ticking Stripe Fabric Stocking Ornament has great antique style and features a paper tag that reads, "Early 1776." The set of 2 simple stockings are paired with a rustic safety pin and can be displayed together or separately as part of a Christmas or Americana collection. Measures 16.5" long by 3.75" wide.
- Material: Fabric
- Size: 16.5" L x 3.75" W x 0.25" D
- Color: Dark Red, Tan
- Designer: Stephanie Shockey

column1: Life Is Better On The Porch Framed Shiplap Sign
column4:
This framed sign reads "Life is better on the Porch" with a white background and shiplap-style grooved lines. The frame has a natural wood finish and there is sawtooth hardware pre-installed on the back for hanging display. Measures 8" high by 19.75" across and 1.5" deep.
- Material: Wood
- Size: 8" H x 19.75" W x 1.5" D
- Color: Black, White, Brown

The Orange Burlap Pumpkin Pick, 30.5” is a great way to instantly add Fall, Thanksgiving, or Halloween notes to displays. Eight mini pumpkins with orange burlap bases and brown plastic stems grace this festive Fall pick. The stems are wrapped wire for easy positioning and measures 30.5" high. This pick looks great added to cans, vases, or hanging containers for an easy Fall refresh.
Material: Burlap, plastic, wire
Size: 30.5" H x 10" W x 10" Dp.
Colors: Orange, brown

The Pampas Grass Pick, 28", Natural will bring sheer delight when you see how many things it can accent! Sporting a natural creamy color, this lovely feathery sheer pick features sprigs of soft, faux pampas grass. This pick is perfect anywhere you need a little extra warmth and beauty and looks great in Fall, Spring and everyday displays. Measures 28" high.
Material: Faux pampas grass
Size: 28" H
Colors: Cream, brown

Our Blessed Pillow Ornament is stuffed, muslin fabric with a stitched design featuring the word, "JOY" surrounded by hearts and pine greenery. This ornament is perfect for hanging from a doorknob from the jute string. Pillow measures 3.5" high by 5" wide by 1.5" thick and has a solid green back.
- Material: Fabric
- Size: 3.5" H x 5" W x 1.5" D
- Color: White, Red, Green, Black
- Designer: Suzie Pienta

The Frosted Woodland Cedar Garland will add a little rustic charm to the farmhouse this Winter. This plastic cedar styled garland is light green with natural pinecones. A dusting of snowy white gives the garland a frosted look. This 4.5" long garland is versatile enough to pair with a wide variety of styles and decor while still catching the eye. Wrap around the curtains or run along the curtain rod for a lovely winter forest feel.
Material: Plastic, pinecones
Size: 4.5 ft L
Colors: Green, brown, white

Our Primitive Snowman Pillow Ornament is stuffed fabric with a stitched and painted snowman. The pillow has a great antique look and is perfect for hanging from a doorknob or chair finial as part of a rustic winter collection. Pillow measures 4.5" high by 3.75" wide by 1.5" thick and has a jute string hanger.
- Material: Fabric
- Size: 4.5" H x 3.75" H x 1.5" D
- Color: Tan, Black, Burgundy, Cream
- Designer: Dawn Stake

Our Primitive Brown Pumpkin is stuffed fabric with a simple, round design and an oversized stem. Pumpkin is accented with dried moss and a raffia bow. Measures 4.5" in diameter by 10" high and will look great paired with similar fabric pumpkins in a rustic Fall display.
- Material: Fabric, Wood
- Size: 4.5" Dia. x 10" H
- Color: Brown, Tan, Dusty Green
- Designer: Dawn Stake

The Chrysanthemum Branch, Cream, 30” all add a fresh, delightful note to the farmhouse this Spring. This large, tantalizing blossom is made of ruffly cream-white fabric petals. It is accented with three green fabric leaves and sits atop a green plastic coated wire stem. With its neutral tones and beauty, this Spring-time chrysanthemum just might find its way into everyday displays! Measures 30" high.
Material: Fabric, plastic, wire
Size: 30" H
Colors: Cream, green

column1: Will Trade Candy For Wine Block Sign
column4:
The Will Trade Candy For Wine Block Sign will turn trick or treat into a grown-up activity. This fun Halloween sign reads ‘Will trade Candy for Wine’ on an orange wood block with white text and distressed edges. The word ‘candy’ is accented in striped candy-corn colors. Pair this sign with our other Halloween candy and wine inspired signs or display with Fall florals and wine glasses for a fun look. Measures 5.5" high by 3.5" wide by .5" deep.
Material: Wood
Size: 5.5" H x 3.5" W x .5" Dp.
Colors: Orange, white, yellow

column1: Primitive Snowman Candy Cane Pillow Ornament
column4:
Our Primitive Snowman Candy Cane Pillow Ornament is stuffed fabric with a stitched and painted snowman and candy cane design. Has a great rustic, antiqued look and is perfect for hanging from a doorknob or chair finial at Christmas time. Pillow measures 5" high by 4" wide by 1.5" thick and has a jute string hanger.
- Material: Fabric
- Size: 5" H x 4" H x 1.5" D
- Color: Tan, Brown, Burgundy, Black, Cream
- Designer: Dawn Stake

Add grace and charm to Spring time decor with the Chrysanthemum Branch, Peach, 30". This sizable bloom has fabric petals in shades of peach with notes of pink. Three green fabric leaves accent the plastic covered wire stem which allows easy posing. This 36" high chrysanthemum stem looks wonderful laying along side candles and beaded garlands or poking out of trays and vases.
Material: Fabric, plastic, wire
Size: 30" H
Colors: Peach, pink, green

Our Primitive Gingham Snowman Pillow is stuffed fabric with a stitched and painted snowman and Christmas tree design. Features red gingham fabric and has a great antique look. Measures 9.5" in diameter by 2" thick and will be a unique accent in a rustic holiday collection.
- Material: Fabric
- Size: 9.5" Dia. x 2" D
- Color: Tan, Green, Burgundy, Cream
- Designer: Dawn Stake

column1: Cheetah Print Winter Clothes Ornament, 3 Asstd.
column4:
The Cheetah Print Winter Clothes Ornament assortment will add a little texture and pattern to the farmhouse Christmas tree. This assortment of wooden cutout ornaments features a subdued animal print with white knit pattern. There is a white mitten with animal print cuff, an animal print stocking with white knit cuff and a winter hat with animal print puffball and base. The ornaments are topped with wooden beaded jute hangers and will make a fun addition to the Christmas tree along with garlands or mantle hooks. Mitten measures 4" high by 2.75" wide. Stocking measures 4" high by 3" wide. Hat measures 4" high by 4.5" wide. All ornaments have a .25" depth.

Please note: This item features an assortment of designs which are each sold individually (not as a set). When you order the price break quantity of 24, you will receive 8 of each style when available.
Material: Wood, jute
Size: Hat: 4" H x 4.5" Wx .25" Dp.
Mitten: 4" H x 2.75" W x .25" Dp.
Stocking: 4" H x 3" W x .25" Dp.
Colors: White, gray, tan

Our Christmas Tree Pillow Ornament is stuffed fabric featuring a felt tree accented with dried moss and a red, wooden star. The back of this puffy ornament is red gingham and it can hang from a doorknob or hook. Pillow measures 4.25" high by 3.25" wide by 1.5" thick and has a jute string hanger.
- Material: Fabric, Wood
- Size: 4.25" H x 3.25" W x 1.5" D
- Color: White, Green, Red, Tan
- Designer: Suzie Pienta

column1: Hot Cocoa/Holly Jolly Button Holly Ornament, 2 Asstd.
column4:
This ornament sells in 2 assorted designs and reads either, "holly jolly" or "hot cocoa" in whimsical lettering beneath felt holly leaves, pip berries, and a twine bow. The chunky, round plaque measures 4" in diameter and hangs by a twine string. Ideal for adding charm to a wall hook or Christmas tree.
Note: Item is sold in an assortment of 2 different designs, not as a pair.
- Material: Wood, Fabric
- Size: 4" Dia. x 0.75" D
- Color: Burgundy, White, Green, Tan
- Designer: Michelle Kildow

This assortment of 3 ornaments reads, "Queen of Halloween," "Wonderfully Wicked," or "Candy Inspector" in whimsical black lettering on a solid orange background. The wooden plaques measure 3.25" high by 5" wide and hang by a black & white gingham ribbon.
Note: Item is sold in an assortment of 3 different designs, not as a set.
- Material: Wood, Fabric
- Size: 3.25" H x 5" W x 0.75" D
- Color: Orange, Black
- Designer: Michelle Kildow

column1: Hello Santa/Candy Canes Button Holly Ornament, 2 Asstd.
column4:
This ornament sells in 2 assorted designs and reads either, "hello Santa" or "candy canes" in whimsical lettering beneath fabric holly leaves, a twine bow, and button "berries." The chunky, round plaque measures 4" in diameter and hangs by a twine string. Ideal for adding charm to a wall hook or Christmas tree.
Note: Item is sold in an assortment of 2 different designs, not as a pair.
- Material: Wood, Fabric
- Size: 4" Dia. x 0.75" D
- Color: Burgundy, White, Green, Tan
- Designer: Michelle Kildow

column1: Sweater Weather Round Hanging Sign W/Burlap Bow, 3 Asstd.
column4:
This assortment of 3 hanging signs reads, "Sweater Weather," "Hello Fall," or "Fall Cuddles" in whimsical black lettering on an orange background. The signs are decorated with fabric bows, felt leaves, rustic, paper-wrapped curled wire, and bits of pip garland. Each wooden plaque measures 6.5" across and hangs by a small rope.
Note: Item is sold in an assortment of 3 different designs, not as a set.
- Material: Wood, Fabric, Wire
- Size: 6.5" Dia. x 0.75" D
- Color: Orange, Black, Tan
- Designer: Michelle Kildow

Our Jack O Lantern Pillow Ornament is stuffed fabric and features a felt pumpkin alongside a small, wooden bat on dried moss. The back of the pillow is orange and it can hang from a doorknob as a cute Halloween or Fall accent. Pillow measures 4.25" square by 1.25" thick.
- Material: Fabric
- Size: 4.25" Sq. x 1.25" D
- Color: Black, White, Orange, Black
- Designer: Suzie Pienta

column1: Until We Meet Again Ornament, 3 Asstd.
column4:
This assortment of 3 wooden ornaments have a simple design with memoriam sentiments in painted lettering. Designs read, "Until we meet again," "Forever in our hearts," or "Your wings were ready but our hearts were not." Hangs by a flexible, wire loop. Sign measures 3" tall by 4.5" wide.
Note: Item is sold in an assortment of 3 different designs, not as a set.
- Material: Wood
- Size: 3" H x 4.5" W x 0.25" D
- Color: Black, Green, Yellow
- Designer: Michelle Kildow

column1: Until We Meet Again Plant Stake, 3 Asstd.
column4:
This assortment of 3 wooden plant stakes have a simple design with memoriam sentiments in painted lettering. Designs read: "Until we meet again," "Forever in our hearts," or "Your wings were ready but our hearts were not" and will be perfect for a bouquet or potted plant. Measures 9.5" tall by 4.5" across.
Note: Item is sold in an assortment of 3 different designs, not as a set.
- Material: Wood
- Size: 9.5" H x 4.5" W x 0.25" D
- Color: Black, Green, Yellow
- Designer: Michelle Kildow

This assortment of 3 wooden ornaments have a simple design with memoriam sentiments in painted lettering. Designs read, "In loving memory," "Always remembered & forever loved," or "A piece of my heart is in heaven." Hangs by a flexible, wire loop. Sign measures 3" tall by 4.5" wide.
Note: Item is sold in an assortment of 3 different designs, not as a set.
- Material: Wood
- Size: 3" H x 4.5" W x 0.25" D
- Color: Black, Gray, Ivory
- Designer: Michelle Kildow

column1: In Loving Memory Plant Stake, 3 Asstd.
column4:
This assortment of 3 wooden plant stakes have a simple design with memoriam sentiments in painted lettering. Designs read, "In loving memory," "Always remembered & forever loved," or "A piece of my heart is in heaven" and will be perfect for a bouquet or potted plant. Measures 9.5" tall by 4.5" across.
Note: Item is sold in an assortment of 3 different designs, not as a set.
- Material: Wood
- Size: 9.5" H x 4.5" W x 0.25" D
- Color: Black, Gray, Ivory
- Designer: Michelle Kildow

Resin tray measuring 13" W x 5" D has the look and feel of authentic treenware at a fraction of the cost! This piece is stained a natural wood color and is distressed to give it a hand-carved look.For decorative use only. Do not use with food or liquids.

This resin rectangular bowl measures 13" L x 6-1/2" W and resembles primitive treenware of the past complete with a stained natural wood color and distressing for a hand-carved look. Slab handles on both sides.
For decorative use only. Do not use with food or liquids.

Our Green Plaid Chunky Trees is a set of 2 wooden, pine tree sitters with light green sides and a dark green plaid front. Perfect for accenting a larger tabletop arrangement or for filling in a winter tiered tray display. The shorter tree stands 3" high and the taller tree is 3.5" high.
- Material: Wood
- Size:
Short: 3" H x 2" W x 0.75" D
Tall: 3.5" H x 2.5" W x 0.75" D
- Color: Dark Green, Light Green
- Designer: Suzie Pienta

Our Cardinal Family Pillow Ornament is stuffed fabric and features a felt cardinal and the word, "family." The back of the pillow is a red gingham pattern and it is perfect for hanging from a doorknob. Pillow measures 5.5" high by 4.25" wide by 1.5" thick and has a jute string hanger.
- Material: Fabric
- Size: 5.5" H x 4.25" W x 1.5" D
- Color: White, Red, Black
- Designer: Suzie Pienta

Our Joy Tree Pillow Ornament is stuffed, muslin fabric with a stitched design of a primitive Christmas tree with the word, "JOY." This ornament is perfect for hanging from a doorknob with the jute string. Pillow measures 5" high by 3.5" wide by 1.5" thick and has a solid green back.
- Material: Fabric
- Size: 5" H x 3.5" W x 1.5" D
- Color: White, Red, Green, Black
- Designer: Suzie Pienta

Our Warm and Cozy Pillow Ornament is stuffed, muslin fabric with a stitched design of holly greenery and reads, "warm and cozy." This ornament is perfect for accenting a doorknob or mantle as part of a winter collection. Pillow hangs by a jute string and measures 3.75" high by 5.25 long by 1.5" thick.
- Material: Fabric
- Size: 3.75" H x 5.25" W x 1.5" D
- Color: White, Green, Red, Black
- Designer: Suzie Pienta

Our Autumn Bliss Oval Tray has a painted design with a pumpkin and a leafy vine alongside the words "autumn bliss" on an orange background. This decorative, wooden tray will be a perfect Fall centerpiece on a sideboard or shelf. Measures 15.5" across by 5.5" high.
- Material: Wood
- Size: 5.5" H x 15.5" W x 1" D
- Color: Orange, White, Tan, Gray
- Designer: Michelle Kildow

Our BOO Pumpkin Garland is a strand of 3 wooden tags shaped like pumpkins which spell out the word "BOO" with dimensional letters. Adds a festive accent to any Halloween display. Measures 2.5" tall by 25" long, including the jute twine string which has a loop at each end for easy hanging.
- Material: Wood
- Size: 2.5" H x 25" L (including string)
- Color: Orange, Black, Tan
- Designer: Suzie Pienta

column1: Light Fall Ombre Eucalyptus Leaf Wreath
column4:
Add a beautiful accessory to the front door, entry way, or mantle this Autumn season with the Light Fall Ombre Eucalyptus Leaf Wreath. Featuring papery foam eucalyptus leaves on twisted wire stems in lovely dried leaf tones, this wreath looks great hanging over displays of candles, beads and Fall-themed signs. Wreath measures 10" on the inside diameter and approximately 16-18" on the outside diameter.
Material: Foam, wire
Size: 10" Inside Dia., Approx. 16"-18" Outside Dia.
Colors: Brown, gold, cream

Our Felt & Wood Primitive Tree Ornament is a triangular Christmas tree with a wood frame, a woven plaid fabric panel, and a wooden spool that is wrapped in jute. Hangs by a curled wire hook and is accented with a rustic jingle bell. Measures 7" high by 3.25" wide and 1" deep.
- Material: Wood, Metal
- Size: 7" H x 3.25" W x 1" D
- Color: Red, Green, Tan, Brown
- Designer: Dawn Stake

column1: 5" Felt & Wood Primitive Tree Ornament, 2 Asstd.
column4:
Our Felt & Wood Primitive Christmas Tree Ornament sells in 2 assorted variations: one with red & black fabric and one with black & white fabric. This ornament is a primitive pine tree made of a wood frame, a buffalo check fabric panel, and a wooden spool wrapped in jute. Each ornament hangs by a wire hook and is accented with a rustic jingle bell. Measures 5.5" high by 3.5" wide and 1" deep.
Note: Item is sold in an assortment of 2 different designs, not as a pair.
- Material: Wood, Metal
- Size: 5.5" H x 3.5" W x 1" D
- Color: Red, White, Black, Tan
- Designer: Dawn Stake

column1: 2/Set, Black & Red Buffalo Check Fabric & Wood Nesting Trees
column4:
Our Black & Red Buffalo Check Fabric & Wood Nesting Trees are a set of 2 primitive pine trees: one with red & black fabric and one with black & white fabric. These sitters have chunky wood frames with patterned fabric panels on both the front and back. They can be displayed nested or separately and will add a rustic touch to any Christmas display. The large tree measures 9" high by 6.5" wide and 1.75" deep, while the small tree is 6" tall by 3.5" wide.
- Material: Wood, Fabric
- Size: Lg: 9" H x 6.5" W x 1.75" D, Sm: 6" H x 3.5" W x 1.75" D
- Color: Red, White, Black, Tan
- Designer: Dawn Stake

column1: 2/Set, Buffalo Check Nesting Felt & Wood Trees
column4:
Our Buffalo Check Nesting Felt & Wood Trees are a set of 2 primitive pine trees: one with red & black fabric and one with black & white fabric. These chunky sitters have wood frames with buffalo check fabric panels on both the front and back. They can be displayed nested or separately and will add a rustic touch to any Christmas display. The large tree measures 10.75" high by 8" wide and 1.75" deep, while the small tree is 8.75" tall by 5" wide.
- Material: Wood, Fabric
- Size: Lg: 10.75" H x 8" W x 1.75" D, Sm: 8.75" H x 5" W x 1.75" D
- Color: Red, White, Black, Tan
- Designer: Dawn Stake

The White Metal Bathtub brings a charming and functional accessory to the farmhouse bathroom. This white finished metal claw foot tub has glossy black accents at the rim and legs. It measures 6” high by 12” wide with a 5.5” depth. This tub looks darling when filled with bathroom accessories such as hand towels, extra soap, lotions, air fresheners and more!
Material: Metal
Size: 6" H x 12" W x 5.5" Dp.
Colors: White, black

column1: Our Family Slat-Look Framed Sign, 3 Asstd.
column4:
This assortment of 3 framed signs have a slat-styled background in one of three farmhouse colors. Each sign features a lovely phrase about family in white script and text. One frame has a slate blue background and reads "Our Family - a circle of strength. founded on faith. joined in love. kept by God." Another reads "Family - where life begins and love never ends" on a gray background. And the third has a soft taupe background and reads "This is us - our life. our story. our home." Signs measure 10" square with a 1.5" depth and have a sawtooth hanger.
Note: This is not a set - item is sold in an assortment of 3 different designs. When you order the price break amount of 3 you will receive 1 of each design.
- Material: Wood
- Size: 10" Sq. x 1.5" D
- Color: White, Gray, Blue, Taupe, Brown

The Weeping Pampas Grass Branch, Brown will add a sheer, beautiful look to farmhouse decor. This floral has soft brown faux pampas grass stems and measures 46" high. A flowing or weeping look is created by the extra soft filaments. This branch pairs nicely with pumpkins in the Fall, bird nests in Spring, and a variety of other accessories year-round!
Material: Faux pampas grass
Size: 46" H
Color: Brown

The Weeping Pampas Grass Branch, White will add a little feathered flair to everyday farmhouse decor. Made up of large sprigs of faux pampas grass in pure white, this 46" high branch looks beautiful laying along mantles or shelves. The filaments are soft and flowing for a lovely weeping look when the branch is draped or display upright for a more fanned, fun look.
Material: Faux pampas grass
Size: 46" H
Colors: White, brown

Fill everything with the Mini Cream Pumpkin Bowl Fillers, 10/Set to celebrate abundance this harvest season. Dark brown plastic stems top these cute, mini, cream-colored plastic pumpkins. They come in sets of ten for filling baskets, bowls and containers. Stack these pumpkins in the center of one of our Ombre Eucalyptus Leaf Candle Rings for a fun look. Pumpkins measure 1.5” in diameter with a 2” height and come in a set of ten.
Material: Plastic
Size: 1.5" Dia. x 2" H
Colors: Cream, brown

The Triple Pampas Grass Spray, Natural will add a touch of whimsy and natural beauty to displays. Featuring long, thin leaves in green, this 35" high spray is topped with feathery faux pampas grass in a warm cream color. This sizable floral looks gorgeous filling larger milk cans and containers.
Material: Faux pampas grass
Size: 35" H
Colors: Cream, green

column1: In This House We Are Thankful Pumpkin Truck Box Sign
column4:
This box sign features a watercolor-style truck and pumpkin illustration. Reads, "In this house we are thankful grateful and so very blessed" in a teal, orange, and black design. Measures 12" tall by 9" wide and will be a fresh addition to a Fall display.
- Material: Wood
- Size: 12" H x 9" W x 1.5" D
- Color: White, Teal, Orange
- Designer: Barbara Lloyd

The Orange "Thankful" Hanging Script Sign will bring a little gratitude to the farmhouse this Autumn. This lovely burnt orange script sign is wood and reads 'thankful.’ It looks lovely hanging over the dinner table where friends and family gather or over the mantle. It can be used to give a little thanks all year long but pairs beautifully with Fall-time florals and décor! Measures 5" high by 20" wide by .25" deep.
Material: Wood
Size: 5" H x 20" W x .25" Dp.
Colors: Orange

column1: Fall Ombre Eucalyptus And Berry Garland
column4:
The Fall Ombre Eucalyptus and Berry Garland is a lovely way to bring the Fall foliage indoors. This garland has a unique look with its round eucalyptus leaves on twisted wire stems that end in loops. Featuring a lovely gradient of colors from reddish browns to golden creams, the eucalyptus leaves are made of a lovely papery foam. Sprigs of abundant cream-colored berries produce a pop of lighter color while long thin leaves in soft brown and white add length. This garland looks great running down the center of a table in place of a fabric runner or strung along a mantle or banister. Measures 5 ft in length.
Material: Foam, fabric, wire
Size: 5 ft L
Colors: Brown, gold, cream

column1: Merry Christmas Red Fabric Stocking Ornament
column4:
This red fabric stocking has textured, off-white trim and features a rustic jingle bell on a safety pin. Has a paper tag that reads, "Merry Christmas" and is perfect for filling with a bit of winter greenery. Stocking is 14" long by 3.25" wide and has a string for hanging.
- Material: Fabric, Metal
- Size: 14" L x 3.25" W x 0.25" D
- Color: Red, Brown, Ivory, Tan
- Designer: Dawn Stake

Our Spooky Ghost Fabric Ornament is a stuffed, primitive-style ghost covered in cheesecloth material. Measures about 7.5" tall by 3" across and has a twine loop for hanging. This ghost will be unique addition to a rustic, Halloween decor collection.
- Material: Fabric
- Size: 7.5" H x 3" W x 2" D
- Color: Ivory, Tan
- Designer: Kitty Johnson

The Pumpkin Pie Mini Stick assortment is made of pumpkin spice and everything nice. These cute wooden blocks feature humorous phrases in script and text with fun, watercolor style illustrations. One reads ‘I love you more than Pumpkin Anything.’ Another states ‘eat like no one is watching - Thanksgiving.’ The third reads ‘who loves ya baby? Pumpkin Pie.’ Each block has a white background with lightly distressed edges and sports an illustration of pumpkin pie in some form. These sticks look lovely with Fall florals, pumpkins and candles and make easy additions to shelves, trays and tabletops. Blocks measure 1" high by 6" wide with a .5" depth.

Please note: This item features an assortment of designs which are each sold individually (not as a set). When you order the price break quantity of 18, you will receive 6 of each style when available.
Material: Wood
Size: 1" H x 6" W x .5" Dp.
Colors: White, brown, gray

column1: Full Of Thanks Pumpkins Square Block, 3 Asstd.
column4:
This wooden block sells in an assortment of 3 designs, each featuring a pumpkin-themed teal and orange watercolor illustration. Designs read either, "Grateful and full of thanks," "Give thanks to the Lord for he is good," or "Everything that God does begins with a seed and ends with a harvest." Measures 4" square by 0.75" thick and will be a bright and airy addition to a Fall display.
Note: Item is sold in an assortment of 3 designs, not as a set.
- Material: Wood
- Size: 4" Sq. x 0.75" D
- Color: White, Teal, Orange, Black
- Designer: Barbara Lloyd
